articles.title: Rajeev Ravi’s Thuramukham is a densely packed period drama which has its moments - The News Minute
articles.description: After Kammatipaadam (2016), Thuramukham, meaning ‘harbour’, is another Rajeev Ravi ode to the historical struggles that form the bedrock of a modern city like Kochi. The period drama, written by Gopan Chidambaram, is based on an award-winning play of the same…
articles.content: At 174 minutes, Thuramukham is an ambitious recounting of an important historical episode. Its not all smooth sailing, but the ship does make it to the shore.After Kammatipaadam (2016), Thuramukham, … [+5454 chars]
